welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tervuren, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and rich history. We invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in its beauty. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
